name: OX-NETAL® 3
description: OX-NETAL® 3 is a high performance foaming alkaline detergent with high degreasing power. Maximum adherence. The exclusive formulation of its foam guarantees greater adherence to surfaces, maximizing its degreasing power. Ideal product for removing extreme dirt of an organic nature (fat, protein, etc.). Specially formulated for cleaning surfaces, equipment, utensils and installations with a large amount of grease and dirt. Superior foam with prolonged adherence that guarantees an optimal period of action, maximizing the effectiveness of the cleaning process.
